txt.en:
'The advanced version of this event will require you to impress us all with your amazing strength and balance.

'You will receive a mighty dwarf-club from me, should you choose to participate, and you may use this club to bash your fellow competitors all about the arena. If you do this enough times to impress me, without being knocked out of the arena, I will even have a nice reward for you!'

<rgb=#FF0000>In the advanced version of the quest, you will need to be careful not to leave the arena at any time. Try to maneouvre away from other players who may be able to knock you out of bounds. You will still need to hit enough other players: simply target a nearby player and use the item. You do not need to collect the Glorious Beer, but feel free to hit anyone going for it!</rgb>
